title: @Riot, it's been 6 months and EB Games still doesn't stock Amumu Pop! Vinyls.
body:
What's the deal?

EDIT: Meanwhile NA and EU are having a cry over a fucking icon.

replies.body:
Because Riot and EBGames are the same company.

 l m a o
EB Games is their only official distributor for these items in Australia. It's on Riot to make sure EB Games stocks them.
